title: Moto X3M Winter

headings.text: How to Play Moto X3M Winter
How many levels are in Moto X3M 4: Winter?
How do you go super fast in Moto X3M?
How to flip faster in Moto X3M?
How do I perform wheelies in Moto X3M?
How do I make a boosted start in Moto X3M?

controls: Gas: W or Up Arrow KeyBrake: S or Down Arrow KeyLift Front Wheel: ALift Back Wheel: D
content.howToPlay: Start off with a wheelie and race to the finish line as fast as you can.Ride your bike through challenging obstacles with a snowy backdrop full of snowmen, festive trees, and the cheerful spirit of Christmas.Perform flips mid-air to trim half a second from your timer.Be careful to not to break the little rider's neck or explode the bike by crashing.The faster you complete the course, the more stars you earn.These stars are key to unlocking new levels and bikes, so aim for a high rating in each level.Challenge yourself to complete all 25 levels in under 15 minutes!
content.developer: Moto X3M 4: Winter was developed by MadPuffers, the creators behind the entire Moto X3M series.

fullContent: Home› BikeMoto X3M WinterBy OnlineGames.ioMake Game Full ScreenRide your bike on icy mountains this time! Moto X3M Winter is the 4th and the coldest game of the series. You'll take your bike to icy mountains, navigating through slippery roads, rocket boosters, and speedy saws chasing after you. With new obstacles and exciting features, this winter wonderland is anything but serene.We know playing the Moto X3M Spooky Land gave you chills, and we bet this one will leave you freezing.ControlsGas: W or Up Arrow KeyBrake: S or Down Arrow KeyLift Front Wheel: ALift Back Wheel: DHow to Play Moto X3M WinterStart off with a wheelie and race to the finish line as fast as you can.Ride your bike through challenging obstacles with a snowy backdrop full of snowmen, festive trees, and the cheerful spirit of Christmas.Perform flips mid-air to trim half a second from your timer.Be careful to not to break the little rider's neck or explode the bike by crashing.The faster you complete the course, the more stars you earn.These stars are key to unlocking new levels and bikes, so aim for a high rating in each level.Challenge yourself to complete all 25 levels in under 15 minutes!How many levels are in Moto X3M 4: Winter?The game features 25 levels, each progressively more challenging with new obstacles to overcome.How do you go super fast in Moto X3M?Wheelies and boost charging! Press the W, A, and D keys together to charge the boost and speed up simultaneously.How to flip faster in Moto X3M?Gain speed from a ramp and press the left or right arrow key while airborne to perform flips. For backflips, use A or the left arrow; for front flips, use D or the right arrow. Backflip when climbing up, and front flip when descending for better control.How do I perform wheelies in Moto X3M?Press A or the left arrow key to lift the bike’s front wheel—a move known as a wheelie.How do I make a boosted start in Moto X3M?To save time at checkpoints, press the gas and brake pedals (W and S keys) simultaneously for a speed boost before taking off.DeveloperMoto X3M 4: Winter was developed by MadPuffers, the creators behind the entire Moto X3M series.More Games Like ThisIf you enjoy dirt biking games, check out the rest of the Moto X3M series at OnlineGames.io. Originally, there are 6 games of the MotoX3M series however, Moto X3M 2 and Moto X3M 3 games are no longer available in any platform. Each one of the remaining 4 games, embraces a different festive aesthetics such as summer pool party, Halloween and Christmas. Pick your season and start playing now!Moto X3MMoto X3M 5: Pool PartyMoto X3M 6: Spooky LandThis article was updated on September 2, 20241 Player2DBikeCrashCrazyDrivingFreePhysicsRacingStuntTrial
